word:
Not to Ask--"Are They Worthy?"--To the appeal of the erring, the tempted, the wretched victims of want and sin, the Christian does not ask, Are they worthy? but, How can I benefit them? In the most wretched, the most debased, he sees souls whom Christ 
                                                                           247
died to save, and for whom God has given to His children the ministry of reconciliation.--Mount of Blessing, p. 40.
